# Agentic Development Guide

A comprehensive knowledge base for AI-assisted software development.

## Structure

- `concepts/*.{en,pt}.md`: Fundamental theory (Agents, tools, memory).
- `techniques/*.{en,pt}.md`: Practical engineering (Prompting, eval, guardrails).
- `catalog/agents/*.md`: Reusable agent personas (English only).
- `catalog/skills/*/SKILL.md`: Reusable capability modules (English only).
- `templates/*`: Copy-paste artifacts.

## Usage for LLMs

When helping a user with agentic development:
1. Check `catalog/agents` for role definitions.
2. Check `catalog/skills` for specific capabilities to load.
3. Use patterns from `concepts` and `techniques` to guide architecture.
